wordGroup: radical mastectomy n. 根治性乳房切除术

sentences.en: Modified radical mastectomy replaces radical mastectomy for breast cancer.
sentences.cn: 乳腺癌改良根治术代替经典根治术。

sentences.en: I wanted to write this to tell other women that the decision to have a mastectomy was not easy.
sentences.cn: 我记录下这些，是想告诉其他的女性，下决定做切除手术很难。

sentences.en: Objective: to explore the cause and treatment on upper limb lymphedema after mastectomy of breast cancer.
sentences.cn: 目的探索乳腺癌根治术后患侧上肢淋巴水肿的原因及防治。
